00038 void RequestHandlerMkdirs::run() {
00039   ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00040   const uint8_t *decode_ptr = m_event_ptr->payload;
00041   size_t decode_remain = m_event_ptr->payload_len;
00042 
00043   try {
00044     const char *dname = decode_str16(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00045 
00046     m_broker->mkdirs(&cb, dname);
00047   }
00048   catch (Exception &e) {
00049     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00050     cb.error(e.code(), "Error handling MKDIRS message");
00051   }
00052 }
